name: Vandermonde
description:
2071: Scientists detect alien life on a planet orbiting a nearby star.  

2073: An international effort begins to send a fully automated research mission to study the planet. The mission is named Vandermonde.

2095: The Vandermonde mission leaves Earth orbit.

2252: The Vandermonde ship reaches its destination.  Robots begin recycling the ship to build an orbital research station.

2254: The Vandermonde station acquires a sample alien lifeform for study.

You are that sample. And you're not happy about it.

Escape back to the watery planet surface by finding your way through the station's passages to the teleporter. 

Avoid the robots that patrol the tunnels or program them to help you.

Gameplay is introduced within the game. You can choose any level to play at the title screen. To beat the game you have to play all the way through from level 1.
